parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description:
The ID of the application. 

*   Default value: **app-1000000**.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region in which you want to query storage data. If you leave this parameter empty, data in all regions is returned. Separate multiple regions with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **cn-shanghai**: China (Shanghai)
*   **cn-beijing**: China (Beijing)
*   **eu-central-1**: Germany (Frankfurt)
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Singapore

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket. If you leave this parameter empty, data of all buckets is returned. Separate multiple transcoding specifications with commas (,).

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description: The storage class. Set the value to **OSS**.
